itemBody.p: Your answers should be entered as numbers correct to 2 decimal places

The real parts of your answers should be the same.
The imaginary parts of your answers should have opposite signs.

feedbackBlock.p: So the roots of this equation are x= + j and x= - j
Since you have viewed the solution, your score for this question will be 0.
